description.New India Assurance General Insurance: New India Assurance, one of the oldest and most trusted insurers in India, provides robust protection by covering a wide range of risks including collisions, theft, fire, natural calamities, and incidental damages. With a massive network of authorized garages, it simplifies claim settlements through a quick, cashless process. The company offers 24x7 roadside assistance, doorstep claim support, and easy add-on integration. Dedicated plans exist for both private and commercial vehicles, making it versatile for all customer segments.
description.ICICI Lombard General Insurance: ICICI Lombard provides technologically advanced motor insurance products with extensive coverage for accidents, theft, fire, and natural calamities. It has over 9,000 network garages, offers overnight repair service, doorstep pickup/drop facilities, and AI-driven claim settlements. Its mobile app supports video-based self-inspection, instant policy issuance, and seamless claim tracking. It also provides coverage for consumables, depreciation, and luxury car accessories, ensuring complete financial protection.
description.HDFC ERGO General Insurance: HDFC ERGO delivers transparent and digital-first motor insurance. Policies cover theft, accidents, third-party liability, and natural disasters, with strong 24/7 support. The 'Insta Claim' system offers approvals within minutes, while telematics-based monitoring rewards safe drivers with premium discounts. HDFC ERGO also designs customized policies for electric vehicles, luxury cars, and two-wheelers. Backed by ERGO Group (Germany), it blends global standards with local expertise.
description.Bajaj Allianz General Insurance: Bajaj Allianz emphasizes reliability and speed with a policy that includes comprehensive damage protection, consumables cover, and accident shield add-ons. With 7,000+ cashless garages and real-time claim tracking, it ensures minimal downtime for policyholders. The insurer also provides zero depreciation, key replacement, and accident hospitalization benefits. Its strong financial base ensures smooth settlements even during mass claims after natural disasters.
description.Reliance General Insurance: Reliance General focuses on digital-first experiences with self-inspection through its app, paperless claim approvals, and doorstep claim assistance. It covers accidents, theft, fire, natural calamities, and offers special plans for electric and hybrid vehicles. Known for one of the fastest claim settlement records, it also offers unique add-ons like return-to-invoice, depreciation cover, and emergency roadside support across India.
description.Tata AIG General Insurance: Tata AIG combines the trust of Tata with the expertise of AIG. Its plans cover natural disasters, theft, collision damages, and liabilities. Features include InstaClaim Settlement, 24/7 roadside support, and emergency fuel delivery. Tata AIG provides exclusive coverage for luxury cars and EVs, including battery protection. Its customer service is multilingual and highly rated, ensuring smooth assistance across India.
description.IFFCO Tokio General Insurance: IFFCO Tokio offers affordable, reliable motor insurance, covering theft, accidents, fire, and calamities. Its policies include unlimited roadside assistance calls, cashless services at 4,300+ garages, and coverage for CNG/LPG vehicles. Designed with rural and urban users in mind, it provides simple, transparent policies and quick settlements, making it a trusted choice across India.
description.United India General Insurance: United India, a government-owned insurer, provides flexible coverage options for private and commercial vehicles. It offers protection for accidents, theft, natural disasters, and liabilities. With 3,000+ garages and regional service desks, it ensures quick support even in semi-urban and rural areas. Its fleet insurance plans, bulk policy discounts, and strong financial stability make it attractive to corporate clients and transport operators.
description.National General Insurance: National Insurance Company, a legacy public sector insurer, provides comprehensive vehicle coverage with simple, transparent terms. It covers theft, accidents, calamities, and liabilities, while offering niche add-ons like accessories protection and passenger cover. With a strong office presence across India, it ensures multilingual support. The company is known for catering to unique segments like vintage and classic car owners.
description.Oriental General Insurance: Oriental Insurance offers all-round protection against theft, fire, disasters, and accidents. With a strong nationwide garage network, it ensures quick, cashless repairs. It also provides unique add-ons like alternative transport allowance, personal belongings cover, and nil depreciation benefits. Its versatility makes it popular among both private and commercial vehicle owners.
description.SBI General Insurance: SBI General provides affordable, accessible vehicle insurance tailored for small-town and rural customers. With third-party liability, own damage, theft, and disaster coverage, it ensures broad protection. Add-ons include depreciation cover, return-to-invoice, and roadside assistance. Backed by State Bank of India, its strong financial trust makes it a reliable choice for first-time buyers.
description.Kotak Mahindra General Insurance: Kotak General offers modern motor insurance with comprehensive coverage against theft, accidents, fire, and calamities. Its mobile app enables instant issuance, paperless renewals, and claim tracking. Known for quick settlements and flexible customization, it appeals strongly to urban, tech-savvy vehicle owners.
description.Future Generali General Insurance: Future Generali provides extensive motor insurance, covering own damage, theft, accidents, and liabilities. With a 3,000+ garage network and features like cashless repairs, no claim bonus, and add-ons (engine protector, consumables cover), it ensures strong financial protection. The insurer emphasizes personal service with app-based claims and dedicated helplines.
description.Liberty General Insurance: Liberty General offers budget-friendly but comprehensive vehicle protection. It covers accidents, theft, fire, and third-party liability with optional add-ons like zero depreciation, key replacement, and roadside help. Its customer-centric approach and hassle-free claim settlement have made it a growing choice among middle-class families and first-time car owners.
description.Royal Sundaram General Insurance: Royal Sundaram provides flexible motor insurance with coverage for theft, fire, accidents, and calamities. Add-ons include co-passenger accident cover, depreciation reimbursement, and emergency transport expenses. Known for fast approvals (within 7 days), Royal Sundaram also offers policies with coverage beyond India (on request), making it attractive for cross-border travelers.
description.Cholamandalam MS General Insurance: Chola MS provides reliable policies covering accidents, theft, calamities, and liabilities. Popular among both individuals and commercial vehicle owners, it offers add-ons like zero depreciation, return-to-invoice, and roadside assistance. With strong customer support and quick settlements, it is a preferred choice for fleet operators.
description.Bharti AXA General Insurance (now merged: Bharti AXA was known for transparent, affordable motor insurance covering theft, accidents, and liabilities. Post-merger, ICICI Lombard continues its policies. Bharti AXA's legacy customers benefit from easy claim processing and wide garage networks under ICICI Lombard.
description.Digit General Insurance: Digit Insurance is a new-age digital-first insurer providing fully online motor insurance with customizable IDV, smartphone-based claim inspections, and paperless policy issuance. It covers own damage, theft, calamities, and third-party liabilities. Popular among millennials, Digit offers unique add-ons like tire protection, consumables cover, and roadside breakdown support.
description.ACKO General Insurance: ACKO is a digital-only insurer providing zero-commission, app-based policies with instant settlements. Known for its pocket-friendly premiums and same-day settlement for minor claims, ACKO specializes in two-wheeler and car insurance. Its short-term coverage and app-first service model make it a disruptor in the Indian insurance market.
